def gcd(a, b):
    return a if b == 0 else gcd(b, a % b)


def has_unique_prime(A, B):
    if B == 1:
        return False
    d = gcd(A, B)
    if d == 1:
        return True
    return has_unique_prime(A, B/d)


def main():
    tc = int(raw_input())
    for _ in xrange(tc):
        A, B = map(long, raw_input().split())
        print ("Yes" if not has_unique_prime(A, B) else "No")


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
